formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'RaiseException' =-
[Synopsis] Handle an exceptional condition
[Description] RaiseException(<reason>): This application will jump to the "e" extension in the current context, setting the dialplan function EXCEPTION(). If the "e" extension does not exist, the call will hangup.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
